exceptions.tactic: unfold in_ucp_setb, in_ucp_set; intros; elim (Rle_dec (Rabs (x - y)) 1); intros; split; try assumption; left; unfold is_upper_bound; intros; elim H0; intros; apply Rabs_def2; elim (Rle_or_lt z x); intro; [ left; split; assumption | right; split; [ assumption | apply Rplus_le_reg_l with (2 := H4); replace (1 + x) with (y + 1 - (x - y)); [ idtac | ring ] ] ].
exceptions.exn: The reference in_ucp_set was not found in the current environment.
